text: (islām) dharmayehi bala kirīmak næta. (mandayat) ayahamagehi siṭa (ǣt vī) ṛju mārgaya (at kara gannē kesēda yanna) pæhædili vī giyēya. ebævin kavurun ṣeyitānva pratikṣēpa kara damā, allāhva viśvāsa karannēda, ohu niyata vaśayenma kæḍī noyana śaktimat kam̆bayak allā gattēya. allāh savan denneku hā hon̆din danneku vaśayen siṭinnēya
